title: Public Works Directorate
body: There was one in Funchal since the creation of the Ministry of Public Works in 1852. Before that, there was an office here called the Civil Engineering Archive, directed by officers of the Royal Corps of Engineers. These services are now carried out by the technical department of the District General Board.

Funchal: Place where the Public Works Directorate existed since the creation of the Ministry of Public Works in 1852 and where the Civil Engineering Archive previously operated.

1852: Creation of the Ministry of Public Works and existence of an office in Funchal called the Civil Engineering Archive.
